family.parents: Otis Henry "O.H." Culver and Mabel Gertrude Smith
family.siblings: Evelyn Louise Culver, Leda Gertrude Culver, Mabel Florian Culver, Carroll Nelson Culver

timeline.event: Born November 16, 1905 in Friday Harbor (Note: O.H. Culver's page says 1903)

miscellaneous: Occupation: Elementary school teacher (kindergarten through 2nd grade). Graduate of Bellingham Normal School (now WWU).
researchQuestions: Confirm birth year - 1903 or 1905? (O.H. Culver's page says Nov 16, 1903)
notes: Short page. Birth year discrepancy with O.H. Culver's page.
